ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Speaking as a guy who plays a couple of female characters, I can certainly sympathize ;)  I ve gotten some bizarre tells m self.  A few members of my
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:18 AM 2/15/2002 -0700, you wrote:
>A-freaking-men!
>
>For an even more frightening study, do a survey of the types of remarks real
>women get in tells while playing this game. While I know there are any
>number of "normal" men playing this game (at least I hope).. there is a
>disturbing number of men with absolutely NO idea of how to interact socially
>with women. Frightening. And yes, I am prepared for the flames from the
>overgeneralized, stereotyping remark I have just made. Someday though, I
>will have to compile my screenshots for some amusement!

Speaking as a guy who plays a couple of female characters, I can certainly
sympathize ;) I've gotten some bizarre tells m'self. A few members of my
cleric's guild don't know that I'm a guy, and it's humourous to read some
of the posts on our guild board... Ahh well - I just turn down all the
marriage proposals...

Talies the Wanderer
